item.description: Jazz singer, saxophonist, flutist, actor Stan Strickland performs with Nancy Ostrovsky, who has been called "one of the pioneers of performance painting." Her "Paintings To Music" is live and in the moment, with painting and music in tandem on stage, creating a highly original and innovative event that melds performance art with the fine arts. Tonight Nov. 12 at the Multicultural Arts Center in Cambridge
item.name: Stan Strickland - Sound & Light w/ Performance Artist/Painter Nancy Ostrovsky
